definition.name: Deploy LAMP stack on Azure Virtual Machine
definition.description: This action helps create an Azure Virtual Machine and deploy LAMP stack on it

inputs.name: client-id
inputs.description: Client id to login to azure

inputs.name: tenant-id
inputs.description: Tenant id to login to azure

inputs.name: subscription-id
inputs.description: Subscription id to be used with your az login

inputs.name: resource-group-name
inputs.description: Resource group to deploy your resources to

inputs.name: admin-username
inputs.description: Admin username to login to vm

inputs.name: admin-password
inputs.description: Admin password to login to vm

steps.name: Accept Bitnami marketplace terms
steps.run: az vm image terms accept --urn bitnami:lampstack:5-6:latest

steps.name: Az deploy - LAMP on VM Bitnami
Fetch JSON file from remote repository
Print parameter value
steps.run:
json_file="vm_parameters.json"
# vm name
virtual_machine_name=".parameters.virtualMachineName.value"
result=$(jq -r "$virtual_machine_name" "$json_file")
echo "Virtual Machine Properties"
echo "Name: $result"

# region
location=".parameters.location.value"
result=$(jq -r "$location" "$json_file")
echo "Location: $result"

# vm size
virtual_machine_size=".parameters.virtualMachineSize.value"
result=$(jq -r "$virtual_machine_size" "$json_file")
echo "VM Size: $result"
